column4: how can I reinstall the stock alsa drivers that came with ubuntu edgy? I compiled the newer alsa from source, and it didn't fix my problem, I uninstalled it, now gnome won't start
how can I get the alsa drivers that came with the ubuntu install back without wiping and reinstalling?
apt-get -d install linux-image-$(uname -r) && rm -rf /lib/modules/$(uname -r)/kernel/sound && apt-get --reinstall install linux-image-$(uname -r)
